title: Windows 8.0 Pro x64 en-US WIM Baseline
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 8.0 Pro x64 en-US WIM Baseline

No Windows 8.0 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Registry Settings were modified.
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO.

64-bit MSDN Source:
en_windows_8_x64_dvd_915440.iso

This RTM Source is the final Build 9200

Installation Index:
Windows 8.0 Pro x64

Release File: Win80Pro-x64-en-US-WIM-Baseline.iso
Size: 3.40GiB
SHA-1: 63A24580A773A791BB0D8564F698200BF081AC3A

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
Microsoft DaRT8 SP1 (thx anarchist9027)
imagex for renaming, export
oscdimg for ISO mastering

Features:
-Modifiable install.wim format.
-DaRT8 SP1 integrated into Boot.wim Choose the "Repair your computer" option.
-UEFI boot data added to ISO. You can boot BIOS mode as well.

Notes:
This is an Un-modified Index with no extra files, settings or integration.

-This baseline WIM version will likely be the main release path for patches
I create each month. I had many people complain of 97% failure using install.esd
recovery compression on the final integrated versions of 8.0

-I recommend printing out the win80-pkeys.txt for installs. You can access
the one I put on the disk using shift-f10 during setup, navigating to the dvd
or USB Flash drive, and running "type win80-pkeys.txt" Then simply tab between
the command prompt and the key entry window.

Credits:
murphy78 - Testing, and ISO design

Enjoy Pirates,
murphy78-TPB/MDL :)
